description: Burton keep their League One survival hopes alive with a second half comeback to seal a 2-1 win over Leyton Orient.
title: Burton Albion 2-1 Leyton Orient
title_page: Burton Albion 2-1 Leyton Orient - BBC Sport
maintext:
Burton Albion are unbeaten across their three Football League games against Leyton Orient (W1 D2), with the pair drawing 0-0 in this season’s reverse fixture back in December.
Burton Albion have picked up fewer points at home than any of the 72 clubs in the EFL this season (14), winning just three of their 18 home matches in League One this campaign (D5 L10).
Leyton Orient have won both of their last two league games, this after losing five in a row beforehand. Indeed, none of the O’s last 13 league matches have been drawn (W7 D6), and they have drawn fewer matches than any other side in League One in 2024-25 (5).
